name: A Flutter of Silicon Wings
description:
Fly through a wonderous circuit board forest and collect colorful flowers in this 3D arcade game. Avoid crashing your delicate wings into the ever more gnarly circuit foliage to reach the other side of the forest in one piece.

Made for #OSTJAM 2021, a game jam in which you make a game based on a piece of music that was made in the Two Hour Album Challenge! I chose Tktoniklast by ModalModule as the music, and timed the progression of the forest with the music.

The whole journey only takes 3 minutes (the length of the music), if you can survive that long!

Instructions:

Stay alive until the end of the music by not crashing into foliage too much. Fly through the rainbow flowers to earn points.

ActionControlSteer/DodgeWASD or Arrow KeysFly FasterHold SpacePause MenuEscape key

Music:

Tktoniklast by ModalModule

3rd Party Assets:
DoTween tweening library by DemiGiant; Zector font by GGBot; Kenzo font by Anonymous Foundry; Controller Icons Pack by NullSave.
